text: Motion
Motion
Motion

...Back then,
when you approached me here...

I thought, "Ugh, got caught by some annoying adult..."
...People always talked about my blonde hair at school.

Oh... Haha, sorry for the misunderstanding. I was desperate
when I approached you, so it must have been scary.

...It wasn't like that.
You didn't have any ill intentions towards me...
...Rather, it's like now---

...I mean, I feel like...
Now, I'm glad I became an idol.

I don't know if I'm shining as myself
properly or anything like that...

At least... I'm having fun now.
---To the point where I can't think about anything else.
I hadn't told you yet.
So... thank you.
No, no, it's the other way around---

Agh! Stop! If you say that,
I won't be able to back down even more!
Just accept my thanks quietly!

Y-Yeah...!
Got it...

Haha... Why does it turn out
like this just from saying thank you...!

Haha, sorry about that...!
It's just... like this, you know...
But, well, whatever.
This is also part of who we are.
